english.segment1: You were not supposed to be here. You were not supposed to see this. This is not me, this is not me. This something acting on this body
english.segment2: You should not have come so suddenly. You should have knocked and you wouldnt have seen. Rats in the cellar, rats in the cellar. Just ignore the vermin and forget the whole thing
english.segment3: The truth wont hide. What sort of man am I?. To set these traps. And kill these rats. I must expose the lie
english.segment4: You didnt make these rats appear. When you dont see them, theyre all still here. This is not you, this is not you. This is how I hide my sin from my fear
english.segment5: The truth wont hide. What sort of man am I?. To set these traps. And kill these rats. I must expose the lie
english.segment6: This ones inside. This ones inside. You can see its beady eyes. This ones inside. This ones inside
english.segment7: I cant clean my charcoal soul. What I need is the hand of an exterminator
english.segment8: The truth wont hide. What sort of man am I?. To set these traps. And kill these rats. I must expose the lie
